briefTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Phase III Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Saxagliptin Co-administered With Dapagliflozin Compared to Saxagliptin or Dapagliflozin All Given as add-on Therapy to Metformin in Subject With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Active-Controlled , Parallel Group, Phase III Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Saxagliptin 5mg Co-administered With Dapagliflozin 5mg Compared to Saxagliptin 5mg or Dapagliflozin 5mg All Given as Add-on Therapy to Metformin inPatients With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycaemic Control on Metformin Alone
summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate safety and efficacy of therapy with saxagliptin 5mg co-administered with dapagliflozin 5mg, compared to therapy with saxagliptin 5mg or dapagliflozin 5mg in patients who are inadequately controlled on ≥1500mg/day of metformin monotherapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HbA1c at Week 24
